snippet: Airlines recommended even smaller carry-on bags in an effort to free up space in overhead bins. The guideline is not binding.
abstract: Global airlines agree on new non-binding agreement that would further limit the size of carry-on bags in effort to free up space in overhead bins; rules could invalidate many currently-approved bags, though it is unclear how they will be implemented.
lead_paragraph: Airlines recommended even smaller carry-on bags in an effort to free up space in overhead bins. The guideline is not binding.

headline.main: Global Airlines Move Toward Even Smaller Carry-On Bags
headline.print_headline: Global Airlines Move Toward Even Smaller Carry-On Bags
